name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance web applications, specializing in **ReactNative**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind** for developing user-friendly interfaces. Proficient in using **Expo** for building elegant mobile applications and ensuring customer-centric designs to foster product development in the fintech sector.
Demonstrated expertise in testing and debugging through **Cypress**, as well as implementing performance monitoring with **PostHog** and **Sentry**. Well-versed in full stack development with hands-on experience in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Skilled in deploying cloud-native systems on AWS and Azure, coupling modern microservices architecture with event-driven designs and CI/CD pipelines. A strong advocate for compliance-driven development, aligning projects with HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards while leveraging my strong background in MLOps through tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
